definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 Mi4 shu1 chu4

sentences.english: The justice ' clerk assert that the justice is functi officio.
sentences.chinese: 法官的秘书宣称法官已不再有管辖权。

sentences.english: The author firstly reviews the historical evolution of WTO secretariat.
sentences.chinese: 笔者首先从历史的角度对秘书处做出了追根溯源。

sentences.english: This is my third visit in just over two years as Secretary-General of the United Nations.
sentences.chinese: 这是我担任联合国秘书长两年多来的第三次访问。

sentences.english: At 10 a. m. next day, Secretary-general Yao Haitao met Ms.
sentences.chinese: 次日上午10时，姚海涛秘书长亲切会见了陆洁女士。

sentences.english: Certain amount of project funds can be used to support CCM Secretariat function and member participation.
sentences.chinese: 可使用项目资金支持CCM秘书处工作和成员的参与。

sentences.english: Sheng Maolin, secretary-general of Hunan Province, and heads from related departments directly under the province participated in the investigation.
sentences.chinese: 省政府秘书长盛茂林，省直相关部门负责人参加调研。

sentences.english: A door opened, a white-haired secretarial head, but we aring a compassionate expression, appeared.
sentences.chinese: 一扇门打开了，一个秘书满头白发的脑袋，带着一副。

sentences.english: UN Secretary-General Ban Ki- moon has also extended his condolences.
sentences.chinese: 联合国秘书长潘基文也对巴西火灾遇难者表示哀悼。

sentences.english: The Secretary-General has taken action in all areas of reform under his authority.
sentences.chinese: 秘书长已在受其管辖的全部改革领域采取行动。

sentences.english: WHO is the Secretariat for the International Coordinating Group for Yellow Fever Vaccine Provision (ICG).
sentences.chinese: 世卫组织担当黄热病疫苗供应国际协调小组的秘书处。

sentences.english: UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon sent a congratulatory message to the conference.
sentences.chinese: 联合国秘书长潘基文向大会发来贺信。

sentences.english: NATO Secretary-General Jaap de Hoop Scheffer announced the decision.
sentences.chinese: 北约秘书长夏侯雅伯宣布了这一决定。

sentences.english: UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon described the queen as an anchor for our age.
sentences.chinese: 联合国秘书长潘基文称女王为这个时代的中流砥柱。

sentences.english: Since my alumuation from school two years ago, I have been active in ABC atoneany as a inferior abstruseary.
sentences.chinese: 毕业至今两年来，本人一直在ABC公司任低级秘书。

sentences.english: Stenography is an essential part of secretarial work.
sentences.chinese: 速记是秘书工作中重要的一项。

sentences.english: Tactuality is a abstruseary in my appointment who tries to do as little as feasible.
sentences.chinese: 我办公室里的一个秘书老是想法干得越少越好。

definition: secretary (chief official of a branch of a socialist or communist party)/clerk/scribe
head of a (government etc) department/section chief/section head/secretary/minister/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
head of provincial PRC government department
working hand/member of a work team/participant/(short form of 第一把手[di4 yi1 ba3 shou3]) the boss
